New Records: Shubman Gill scored a half-century as Indian captain for the first time in T20Is
Key Match Events: Washington Sundar took 3 wickets for 15 runs
Post-Match Reflections: India won the match by 23 runs to lead the series 2-1
Zimbabwe's late fireworks didn't suffice to cross the finish line in the big chase of 183
Miscellaneous Highlights: Zimbabwe were sloppy on the field as well. Too many misfields and dropped catches let India score those extra runs which Zimbabwe couldnâ€™t.
India's second consecutive win let them take a 2-1 lead in the series with two more games to go
